programme.title: Living Like a Queen
programme.short_synopsis: Would you live like a Queen? Alistair Cooke examines the lifestyles of the Royals.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke wonders, upon considering the reality, why anyone would want to live like a Queen and examines the lifestyles of US presidents.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Living Like a Queen

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
